channel.title: ::hail command
channel.description:
can someone give me ::hail command and the ::teleall
so i can bring them to me and they say something nice to me :P ty dvdnext im using 317 garboscape

item.title: ::hail command
item.dc:creator: @pureman222 pureman222
item.description:
@pureman222 wrote:

ok heres the the code add this in client.java under } or declare it just…

public void hail()
{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
castOn.plrText = “We Play GrinderScape For Ever Grinderscape.org!!!”;
castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY);
castOn.setAnimation(1651);
castOn.updateRequired = true;
castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}

if u get 100 errors try remove the } if fine

Read full topic

item.title: ::hail command
item.dc:creator: @dvdnext dvdnext
item.description:
@dvdnext wrote:

[quote=“pureman222, post:2, topic:295699”]if(command.startsWith(“hail”) && playerRights >= 2){
hail();
}

if u dont have the public void tell me and il lsend it for u

euhm i get error

client.java:7196: cannot find symbol
symbol : method hail()
location: class client
hail();
^
1 error
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
::alltome here
if (command.equals(“alltome”) && playerRights >= 2) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client) p; // specific player’s client
castOn.toX = absX; // replace with your tele X coord
castOn.toY = absY; // replace with your tele Y coord
}
}
}[/quote]

item.title: ::hail command
item.dc:creator: @pureman222 pureman222
item.description:
@pureman222 wrote:

if(command.startsWith(“hail”) && playerRights >= 2){
hail();
}

if u dont have the public void tell me and il lsend it for u

::alltome here
if (command.equals(“alltome”) && playerRights >= 2) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client) p; // specific player’s client
castOn.toX = absX; // replace with your tele X coord
castOn.toY = absY; // replace with your tele Y coord
}
}
}
